name: Saint Slaughter X Days
description: "Saint Slaughter X Days" is a visual novel produced by the Hollowings production group. The story will revolve around the conflict between the Templar and the sorcerer, the "goodness" and the "evil".
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD Athlon x2 250 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 3450 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: AMD R5 1500X Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon RX 480 Storage: 2 GB available space
